misc: Adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season
biography: Simo, a formidable presence hailing from Hirsala Golf, is set to mark his tenth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Known for his explosive outbursts on the course, Simo's fiery temperament belies a strategic mind and an unwavering commitment to the game.

With three Hector Trophée victories under his belt, Simo brings a wealth of experience to the competition. While the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his consistent performance and dedication make him a perennial contender.

For the 2025 season, Simo has made a significant equipment change, adopting an L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter. This adjustment reflects his relentless pursuit of improvement and willingness to embrace new technologies in his quest for golfing excellence.
